subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[disappear]]; to [[vanish]]; to [[die down]]; to [[settle down]]
# to [[eliminate]]; to [[terminate]]; to [[eradicate]]
# to [[while away]] (time)
# to [[spend]] (money)
# to [[need]]
